newsitem.title: USA: Clinton may name OMB official Social Security head.
newsitem.headline: Clinton may name OMB official Social Security head.

text.p: President Bill Clinton is leaning toward naming Office of Management and Budget (OMB) official Kenneth Apfel as Social Security commissioner, an administration official said on Tuesday.
"Everything is leaning that way," said the official, adding that Apfel, now OMB's associate director for human resources, still had to go through the vetting process.
The official, who asked not to be named, was confirming a report published on Tuesday in the Baltimore Sun newspaper.
